benchmark_details.name: GRASSLAND
benchmark_details.overview: GRASSLAND is a dynamic maze navigation benchmark designed to evaluate dynamic spatial reasoning capabilities, featuring two tasks: Maze Judgment and Maze Navigation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate and improve dynamic spatial reasoning abilities in multimodal large language models.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Performance gains vary significantly across different models, with weaker models benefiting less from the proposed methods.

data.source: Dynamically generated maze environments simulating a pixel grid world.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated based on the model's ability to predict final states and execute correct navigation routes.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better dynamic spatial reasoning capability.
methodology.validation: Extensive evaluations to establish performance baselines and test consistency across different models.
